title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner that bundles Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and others into a single CLI + REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API (npm: ollama).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for the Ollama API (PyPI: ollama).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (PyPI: langchain-ollama) to use Ollama models in chains & agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (Docker-ready) with chat, model management, multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama (Maven Central) supporting chat, embeddings, pull/generate.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for Ollama with syntax highlighting and chat history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Real-time chat web app (Next.js + Tailwind) backed by Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + llama-index to chat with local docs.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration (PyPI: ollama-haystack) for Ollama generators & embedders.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama (NuGet: OllamaSharp) supporting chat, completion, embeddings.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images and Docker Compose stacks for CPU & GPU (nvidia) usage.

title: ollama-npm
summary: npm package providing the official JS/TS client for Ollama (same repo as ollama-js).

title: ollama PyPI
summary: PyPI package for the official Python client (same repo as ollama-python).

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate (crates.io: ollama-rs) for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-rails
summary: Ruby gem (ollama-rails) wrapping Ollama API for Rails apps with ActiveModel-style interface.

title: ollama-r/ollamar
summary: R package (ollamar) providing a simple interface to Ollama for R users.
